scripts.deploy:test: pnpm wrangler:config:test && pnpm build && wrangler pages deploy .output/public
scripts.deploy:prod: pnpm wrangler:config:prod && pnpm build && wrangler pages deploy .output/public
scripts.logs:test: pnpm wrangler:config:test && wrangler pages deployment tail --project-name cloudflare-sso --environment preview --format pretty
scripts.logs:prod: pnpm wrangler:config:prod && wrangler pages deployment tail --project-name cloudflare-sso --environment production --format pretty
